list-item.p: Fatigue: introducing the patients to the nonpharmacological treatment of fatigue, containing maintaining activity vitality and rhythm;
Breathlessness: introducing nonpharmacological treatment of breathlessness to the patients, involving relaxation techniques and breathing, fan therapy, and mindfulness;
Worry: introducing the psychobehavioral strategies to the patients to deal with worry; and
Recap of the former sessions. After ending each session, the patients are given a 1-page summary of content.
